content: view the pattern online now https //en susudiy com/detail id=1877185457305948162 the crocheting guidance available as following https //youtu be/2s3vhsikenq **get yarn kit now** shop on susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/butterfly-claw-hair-clip-crochet-yarn-kit-forest-series-susans-family **shop yarn here** shop on amazon ship to us eu au ca jp uk https //www amazon com/dp/b0dk728z9v maas=maas_adg_889c290d43de9bda447aa1cbdcc98098_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas there are 4 colors in total **yarn amount** please refer to the last pic the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s a new video up
